infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SliceFix AI needs camera access to record your golf swing for analysis.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SliceFix AI needs photo library access to select swing videos for analysis.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SliceFix AI needs microphone access when recording swing videos.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: SliceFix AI uses Face ID for quick and secure sign-in to your account.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow SliceFix AI to use Face ID for quick sign-in.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SliceFix AI to access your camera to record swing videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow SliceFix AI to access your photos to select swing videos.
